subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Mets pitcher Joe Smith endured an uneven 2007 that can be separated into three unequal parts: a sensational beginning, a demotion to the minors, and a mid-September recall.
snippet: Mets pitcher Joe Smith endured an uneven 2007 that can be separated into three unequal parts: a sensational beginning, a demotion to the minors, and a mid-September recall.
